events.name: EV Battery Recycling and Reuse
events.wd_description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling and reuse: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and re-manufacturing.
events.description: Three main methods are used in lithium-ion recycling and reuse: pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and re-manufacturing.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals, but it is challenging because the bacteria need a substantial amount of time to grow and are easily susceptible to contamination.
